item.description:
Join us this summer for a fun weekend , http://BostonMeetupGe... , Click Book Now on the right, Mention Boston Meetup when booking by phone to save $25 or type Boston Meetup in the comment box to get the discount !

Get Out and Play every sport under the sun. Head out on new adventures. Take lessons from a Pro. Dine on an abundance of delicious food. Socialize. Dance all night. Laugh. Relax. And just have fun.

The beautiful and rustic Weekend Resort is located on 300 acres overlooking a sparkling lake. In the nearby Berkshire Mountains of Kent, CT, Club Getaway is just 2Â½ hours from Boston. Just grab a buddy, or come by yourself , meet our group, and make friends everywhere you go.


Join us for a great time and Invite friends, http://BostonMeetupGe... or call 917-868-4268 (if you can't make this weekend , Mention Boston Meetup to save $25 anytime this year at Getaway/ if you have been there already this year, you are elig. for the summer share and can save even more $ , call 917-868-4268 for details, Book Multiple weekends in 2009 for a greater discount)

Invite friends to join our new group, http://BostonMeetup.o...
item.how_to_find_us: call & text Greg @ 917-868-4268 , meet at the welcome party friday night at the boathouse

group.name: #1 Meetup - BOSTON MEETUP, Travel& Events, BOSTONMEETUP.org

item.name: Boston Meetup Presents Boston Meetup Getaway , Fun, Sports and Summer Adventure!
